ProjectTitle: Revisiting the neural bottleneck of information transmission in cochlear implant users
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/03/2023
Documentation: please focus here more on the documentation that you also use for yourself to understand the data later. Will you use (electronic) notebooks, readme files or explanatory lines in your code? Do you have SOPs with details about the procedures?  
Preservation: please note that the preservation time for clinical trail data is now 25 years. Data storage on hard drives is not very secure, have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
